last_episode_to_air.name: AKUDAMA DRIVE
last_episode_to_air.overview: Swindler and Courier have been driven into a corner but are not about to give up. Swindler is prepared to play the part if it will help the children escape.

name: Akudama Drive
overview: Many years ago, a Great Civil War ravaged Japan, leaving the country fragmented between two regions: Kansai and Kanto. In Kansai, a group of six Akudama carry out missions given to them by a mysterious black cat, while evading the police. But a dangerous journey is about to unfold when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama's way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.

episodes.name: SE7EN
episodes.overview: As criminals known as Akudama terrorize Kansai, an ordinary citizen gets dragged into danger when her good intentions steer her wrong.

guest_stars.character: Old lady at the Takoyaki shop (voice)
guest_stars.name: Reiko Suzuki

episodes.name: RESERVOIR DOGS
episodes.overview: The Akudama learn from the plan’s mastermind just how risky and troublesome it will be. As if things weren’t bad enough, trouble comes looking for them first.

episodes.name: MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE
episodes.overview: When the infiltration doesn’t go as expected and they’re running out of time, the group will have to improvise to pull off the ultimate heist.

episodes.name: SPEED
episodes.overview: The Shinkansen speeds ahead, hurtling the crew towards certain death. As they race against time to reach the vault, Executioners show up to derail their plans.

episodes.name: DEAD MAN WALKING
episodes.overview: As the Executioners deal with the aftermath of their failure, the Akudama take a break to recuperate and finally find out their destination.

episodes.name: BROTHER
episodes.overview: When one Executioner arrives for a showdown, Brawler couldn't be happier. As the bloodbath rages on, Pupil struggles to understand why she was left behind.

episodes.name: THE CITY OF LOST CHILDREN
episodes.overview: After a long journey, the team finally reaches their destination. Before the children say their goodbyes, Brother shares his side of the story.

episodes.name: BLACK RAIN
episodes.overview: The Akudama struggle to survive as the hunt for their heads intensifies. While Doctor and Hoodlum run amok, Swindler takes on the role of big sister.

episodes.name: THE SHINING
episodes.overview: Courier joins up with Swindler as they attempt to track Brother down. Meanwhile, Cutthroat is seeing red and is thirstier than ever for blood.

episodes.name: BABEL
episodes.overview: Drastic measures are taken to subdue the civilian uprising. Knowing it's their last chance to save Brother, Courier and crew race towards a showdown at Kansai Station.

episodes.name: WAR GAMES
episodes.overview: Sometimes, the truth is harder to believe than fiction. Unbeknownst to them, Swindler and Courier are at risk of being trapped in Kanto forever.

guest_stars.character: Old lady at the Takoyaki shop (voice)
guest_stars.name: Reiko Suzuki

episodes.name: AKUDAMA DRIVE
episodes.overview: Swindler and Courier have been driven into a corner but are not about to give up. Swindler is prepared to play the part if it will help the children escape.
